about_the_game:
Are you ready to face the dark secrets hidden within the fog?

In an abandoned town, you awaken as a lone survivor, tracing the path of lost memories and forgotten sins. But you are not alone here; sinister entities lurk in every corner, hidden in the thick mist. As time slips away, you must protect both your mind and body, for in this darkness, not only do your fears find you, but you also feed them.

Behind The Mists  offers a chilling survival experience, set in an oppressive fog, with limited resources and haunting puzzles to solve. Light will be your strongest ally, but even it cannot protect you forever. Every step feels like something is following you, every moment demands a plan of escape—only for you to realize, there is nowhere to run.

Gather clues, think strategically to survive, and uncover the truth behind the terror concealed in the fog. But beware; some doors, once opened, can never be closed again...

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes scenes where players try to survive in a fear-filled atmosphere. It features jumpscares (sudden scare elements). Additionally, there are violent scenes involving the use of guns and knives during encounters with creatures. Killing scenes depict blood and violence explicitly. It may not be suitable for players sensitive to such content.
